title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Wall Elevation", ca. 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on white wove paper
markings: Office letterhead in ink: MEMORANDUM FROM/DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVE/NEW YORK/TELEPHONE/EL.5-0481.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at left margin: Rod / 31 1/2 10 1/2 / out from wall / 14" by 36". Dimensions inscribed in graphite throughout drawing. Inscribed in graphite on verso: DID COHEN/GET HIS DESK/AMDUR CALLING.
description: Rough sketch of elevation for Jascha Heifetz apartment, New York City. Two-drawer rectangular cabinet or shelving unit showing dimensions, and side elevation of construction of object.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Wall Elevation", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Graphite and black ink on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-236-1.
